trans-unit.source: A block-level flow content element which enables <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> elements (i.e. a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Button" />) to be embedded (hosted) in flow content.
trans-unit.target: 一个块级别的流内容元素使 <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> 元素（例如，<see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Button" />）嵌入（承载）流内容。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> element (i.e. a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>) may be embedded directly in flow content by enclosing it in a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer> (see example below).
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>元素 (即<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>) 可通过将其封闭在嵌入直接在流内容<xref:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer>（请参阅下面的示例）。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer> may directly host no more than one <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> child.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer>只能直接承载不能超过一个<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>子。

trans-unit.source: However, the child element hosted by an <xref:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer> may host children of its own.
trans-unit.target: 但是，子元素由<xref:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer>可以托管其自己的子级。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer> elements to host <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> elements within flow content.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer>元素与主机<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>在流内容中的元素。

trans-unit.source: The following figure shows how this example renders.
trans-unit.target: 下图显示了此示例的呈现效果。

trans-unit.source: ![Screenshot: UIElement embedded in flow content](~/add/media/blockuicontainer.png "Screenshot: UIElement embedded in flow content")
trans-unit.target: ![屏幕快照： 嵌入在流内容中的 UIElement](~/add/media/blockuicontainer.png "屏幕快照： 嵌入在流内容中的 UIElement")

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new, empty instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer" /> 类的新的空实例。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> object specifying the initial contents of the new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> 对象，它指定新的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer" /> 的初始内容。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer" /> class, taking a specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> object as the initial contents of the new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer" /> 类的一个新实例，将指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> 对象作为新的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer" /> 的初始内容。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates usage of this constructor.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用此构造函数。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> hosted by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置由 <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> 承载的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> hosted by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: 由 <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> 承载的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer" />。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer> may directly host no more than one <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> child.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer>只能直接承载不能超过一个<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>子。

trans-unit.source: However, the child element hosted by an <xref:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer> may host children of its own.
trans-unit.target: 但是，子元素由<xref:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer>可以托管其自己的子级。

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)], wrapping a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> in an <xref:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer> is equivalent to setting that <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> as the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer.Child%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]、 包装<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>中<xref:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer>等同于设置<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>的值作为<xref:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer.Child%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer> elements to host <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> elements within flow content.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer>元素与主机<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>在流内容中的元素。

trans-unit.source: The following figure shows how this example renders.
trans-unit.target: 下图显示了此示例的呈现效果。

trans-unit.source: ![Screenshot: UIElement embedded in flow content](~/add/media/blockuicontainer.png "Screenshot: UIElement embedded in flow content")
trans-unit.target: ![屏幕快照： 嵌入在流内容中的 UIElement](~/add/media/blockuicontainer.png "屏幕快照： 嵌入在流内容中的 UIElement")

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer.Child%2A> property programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer.Child%2A>属性以编程方式。
